fields.name: iPXE Script
fields.description: Default iPXE Render Type with local variables, sections and exit as termination.
fields.command_pre:
{# creating settings as local variables #}{% if settings|length > 0 %}{% for setting_name, setting_value in settings.items %}
set {{ setting_name }} {{ setting_value }}{% endfor %}{% endif %}
fields.command_post:
:action_unterminated
echo Boot Action not terminated correctly. && goto exit_delay

:action_failed
echo Boot Action failed.

:exit_delay
echo Exiting in {{ site_config.reconnect_delay|default:"5" }} seconds, Press CTRL+C to reboot.
sleep {{ site_config.reconnect_delay|default:"5" }} || reboot

:action_exit
exit

fields.name: iPXE Script with Reconnect
fields.description: Default iPXE Render Type with local variables, sections and reconnect as termination.
fields.command_pre:
{# creating settings as local variables #}{% if settings|length > 0 %}{% for setting_name, setting_value in settings.items %}
set {{ setting_name }} {{ setting_value }}{% endfor %}{% endif %}
fields.command_post:
:action_unterminated
echo Boot Action not terminated correctly. && goto exit_delay

:action_failed
echo Boot Action failed.

:exit_delay
echo Reconnecting in {{ site_config.reconnect_delay|default:"15" }} seconds, Press CTRL+C to exit
sleep {{ site_config.reconnect_delay|default:"15" }} || exit

:action_exit
chain --autofree --replace {{ site_config.url }}connect/

fields.name: iPXE Script Debugging
fields.description: Extended iPXE Render Type with local variables, sections, reconnect at the end and additional output for debugging.
fields.command_pre:
{# creating settings as local variables and print them for debugging #}{% if settings|length > 0 %}{% for setting_name, setting_value in settings.items %}
set {{ setting_name }} {{ setting_value }} && echo {{ setting_name }}: {{ setting_value }}{% endfor %}{% else %}echo no settings found.{% endif %}
fields.command_post:
:action_unterminated
echo Boot Action not terminated correctly. && goto exit_delay

:action_failed
echo Boot Action failed.

:exit_delay
echo Reconnecting in {{ site_config.reconnect_delay|default:"15" }} seconds, Press CTRL+C to exit
sleep {{ site_config.reconnect_delay|default:"15" }} || exit

:action_exit
chain --autofree --replace {{ site_config.url }}connect/
